Class SerializationHelper

  • java.lang.Object

extends Object
    Helper class for encoding and decoding ITS data structures.
    Author:
    Philip Vendil, p.vendil@cgi.com

    • Method Detail

      • encodeVariableSizeVector

        public static void encodeVariableSizeVector(DataOutputStream out,
                            List<? extends StructSerializer> variableSizeVector)
                                     throws IOException
        Help method that serializes variable sized vector to the supplied data output stream.
        Parameters:
        out - the data output stream to encode the variable sized vector to,
        variableSizeVector - the variable sized vector (a list of StructSerializer)
        Throws:
        IOException - if serialization failed.

      • decodeVariableSizeVector

        public static List<?> decodeVariableSizeVector(DataInputStream in,
                               Class<?> c)
                                        throws IOException
        Help method that serializes variable sized vector to the supplied data output stream.
        Parameters:
        in - the data input stream to decode the variable sized vector from.
        c - class of the objects contained in data stream, the class must implement a StructSerializer
        Throws:
        IOException - if serialization failed.
